    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_106575</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Force and acceleration on a moving car</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft und Beschleunigung auf einem beweglichen 
Auto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Force et accélération sur une voiture mobile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força e acceleration em um carro movente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza ed accelerazione su un automobile 
commovente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύναμη και ταχύτητα σε ένα κινούμενο αυτοκίνητο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza y aceleración en un coche móvil</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the direction of the force acting on a car as the driver accelerates (top) and decelerates (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">backward force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">deceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">force direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">forward force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moving object</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Richtung der Kraft, die 
auf einem Auto fungiert, während der Treiber beschleunigt (Oberseite)
und verlangsamt (Unterseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la direction de la 
force agissant sur une voiture pendant que le gestionnaire accélère 
(dessus) et ralentit (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o sentido da força que 
age em um carro enquanto o excitador acelera (alto) e retarda (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il senso della forza 
che si comporta su un automobile mentre il driver accelerare (parte 
superiore) e rallenta (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την κατεύθυνση της 
δύναμης ενεργώντας σε ένα αυτοκίνητο καθώς ο οδηγός επιταχύνει 
(κορυφή) και επιβραδύνεται (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la dirección de la 
fuerza que actúa en un coche mientras que el programa piloto acelera 
(tapa) y decelera (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschleunigung</string>
          </keyword>
